Detailed Description

Helper class to manipulate HTTP error codes.

Definition at line 8 of file http.php.

Member Function Documentation

HTTP::error ( $  code = 500,
$  headers = array() 
) [static]

Redirects the request to the error page for the desired HTTP error code.

This method redirects the request to the ErrorController action method that handles the HTTP error code code, optionally sending a set of headers.

Parameters:
code The HTTP error code.
headers An optional set of HTTP headers to send to the client.
